an5.53:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, saddahati tathagatassa bodhim:
an5.53:1.4: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an5.53:1.6: samavepakiniya gahaniya samannagato natisitaya naccunhaya majjhimaya padhanakkhamaya;
an5.53:1.8: yathabhutam attanam avikatta satthari va vinnusu va sabrahmacarisu;
an5.53:1.9: araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu;
an5.53:1.10: pannava hoti, udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
